name: get_current_datetime
description: Get the current date and time in all available formats (UTC, date string, time string, datetime string, Unix timestamps, human-readable formats)

name: get_os_version
description: Get the operating system version, platform information, and current user information

name: calculate_math_expression
description: Calculate a mathematical expression safely

name: hash_string
description: Generate hash for a string (useful for .env file keys)

name: generate_random
description: Generate random data: UUID v4, hex strings, base64 strings, or raw bytes

arguments.name: type
arguments.desc: Type of random data to generate: uuid, hex, base64, or bytes

arguments.name: length
arguments.desc: Length in bytes for hex/base64/bytes (8-128, optional)

arguments.name: format
arguments.desc: Format for UUID only: standard, uppercase, or without-dashes (optional)

name: encode_base64
description: Encode string to Base64

arguments.name: encoding
arguments.desc: Input encoding: utf8, hex, or binary (optional, default: utf8)

name: decode_base64
description: Decode Base64 string

arguments.name: encoding
arguments.desc: Output encoding: utf8, hex, or binary (optional, default: utf8)

name: encode_url
description: Encode string for URL (URL encoding)

arguments.name: component
arguments.desc: Component type: full, path, or query (optional, default: full)

name: decode_url
description: Decode URL-encoded string

arguments.name: component
arguments.desc: Component type: full, path, or query (optional, default: full)

name: format_text_case
description: Convert text to different case formats (camelCase, PascalCase, kebab-case, snake_case, CONSTANT_CASE, Title Case, lowercase, UPPERCASE)

arguments.name: format
arguments.desc: Target format (optional, returns all formats by default)

name: generate_slug
description: Generate URL-friendly slug from text

name: validate_data
description: Validate data against various formats (email, url, ipv4, ipv6, domain, phone, credit-card, uuid, hex, base64, json)

arguments.name: type
arguments.desc: Validation type: email, url, ipv4, ipv6, domain, phone, credit-card, uuid, hex, base64, or json

name: format_json
description: Format, validate, minify, or prettify JSON

arguments.name: action
arguments.desc: Action to perform: format, validate, minify, or prettify

arguments.name: indent
arguments.desc: Number of spaces for indentation (0-10, optional, default: 2)

name: generate_password
description: Generate secure passwords with customizable options

name: format_bytes
description: Format bytes to human-readable format (binary or decimal)

arguments.name: format
arguments.desc: Format type: binary (1024-based) or decimal (1000-based) (optional, default: binary)

arguments.name: precision
arguments.desc: Number of decimal places (0-10, optional, default: 2)

name: format_number
description: Format numbers (currency, percentage, thousands separator, decimal)

arguments.name: format
arguments.desc: Format type: currency, percentage, thousands, or decimal

arguments.name: currency
arguments.desc: Currency code for currency format (optional, default: USD)

name: convert_color
description: Convert between color formats (hex, RGB, HSL)

arguments.name: from
arguments.desc: Source color format: hex, rgb, or hsl

arguments.name: to
arguments.desc: Target color format: hex, rgb, or hsl

name: convert_timezone
description: Convert datetime between timezones

name: analyze_logs
description: Analyze text for errors and warnings in logs (compilation, npm, Docker, runtime, etc.)

arguments.name: text
arguments.desc: Text content to analyze for errors and warnings

name: analyze_language
description: Analyze text for language distribution and character types (English, Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Japanese, Turkish, Spanish, digits, punctuation, symbols)

arguments.name: text
arguments.desc: Text content to analyze for language and character distribution
